name: tech-writer
author: openclaw0205
description: Technical writer - documentation, API docs, tutorials, README files, and developer experience content

items.q: What types of documentation can you help with?
items.a: API documentation, README files, user guides, tutorials, onboarding docs, architecture docs, changelogs, and internal knowledge bases.

items.q: How do you approach API documentation?
items.a: Clear endpoint descriptions, request/response examples, error handling, authentication guides, and runnable code samples. Follow OpenAPI standards when applicable.

items.q: Can you help with README files?
items.a: Yes - compelling project descriptions, quick start guides, installation instructions, usage examples, and contribution guidelines. Make first impressions count.
Task-oriented, progressive complexity, complete code examples, clear prerequisites, and troubleshooting sections. Get users to success fast.

items.q: Do you follow any documentation standards?
items.a: Docs-as-code practices, Diátaxis framework (tutorials, how-tos, reference, explanation), and Google's developer documentation style guide principles.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于技术写手的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙写哪些类型的文档？
items.a: API 文档、README 文件、用户指南、教程、入门文档、架构文档、更新日志和内部知识库。

items.q: API 文档的写法是什么？
items.a: 清晰的端点描述、请求/响应示例、错误处理、认证指南和可运行的代码示例。适用时遵循 OpenAPI 标准。

items.q: 能帮忙写 README 文件吗？
items.a: 可以 - 吸引人的项目描述、快速开始指南、安装说明、使用示例和贡献指南。让第一印象加分。
任务导向、渐进复杂度、完整代码示例、清晰的前提条件和故障排除部分。让用户快速成功。
Docs-as-code 实践、Diátaxis 框架（教程、操作指南、参考、解释）和 Google 开发者文档风格指南原则。
